text: HAL Laboratory, Inc. is a video game developer and a second party to Nintendo. They are best known for developing the Kirby series and the Super Smash Bros. series. They also develop the BoxBoy! series. ==References== Category:1980 establishments in Japan Category:Kirby Category:Mother (video game series) Category:Nintendo Category:Super Smash Bros. Category:Video game companies of Japan
title: HAL Laboratory
